name: tm10
effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The attack power
varies among
different POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The attack power
varies among
different POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the user.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A variable move that changes type
and power depending on the hidden
ability of the Pokémon using it.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on
the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user scatters curious leaves that chase the
target. This attack never misses.
